entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
